items.text: goes too hard on a pull and chops it into the surface before midwicket dives and stops it
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Dhawan, no run

items.text: hangs back and drops it into the point region
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Dhawan, 1 run

items.text: slides into off, a tad too close to cut, finds point as he does so nonetheless
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Sharma, no run

items.text: full on middle, taps to point for a rapid one
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Dhawan, 1 run

items.text: length, spins in, tucked to square leg
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Sharma, no run

items.text: pushes hard off the front foot and chips it in the air off the inside edge, wide of midwicket
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Sharma, 1 run

items.text: punches from close to off stump through point
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Dhawan, 1 run

items.text: full outside off, defended
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Sharma, no run

items.text: full outside off, defended down the pitch
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Sharma, no run

items.text: clips a fuller one to midwicket
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Dhawan, no run

items.text: tries to force a sweep and gets hit on the pad. Dhawan does not take the review. Good call. Looked pretty plumb. Just comes down full and straight with not much room to swing the arms. Hits him in front of middle and leg. Might have been umpire's call even if they had reviewed, so good on Rohit to persuade him to not go for it
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Dhawan, OUT

dismissal.text: S Dhawan lbw b Shakib Al Hasan 40 (47b 4x4 1x6) SR: 85.10

items.text: full on middle, pushed to mid-on
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Rayudu, no run

items.preText: That Dhawan lbw, HawkEye shows, would've just clipped the outside of leg stump. So while he would've been adjudged out anyway, India would have retained the review.
items.text: comes down the track and turns it away with the angle behind square
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Rayudu, 2 runs

items.text: punched back to the bowler off the backfoot
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Rayudu, no run

items.text: front-foot prod into the off side
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Rayudu, no run

items.text: drops to point for a quick one
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Sharma, 1 run

items.text: length on middle, blocked
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Rayudu, no run

items.text: turns minimally from a length, comes forward and blocks
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Rayudu, no run

items.text: even straighter this time, on middle, blocked
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Rayudu, no run

items.text: makes use of the inward angle and crunches a sweep off this fuller ball to deep backward square leg, where Nazmul runs across, dives, slaps it back but not entirely. Makes contact with the rope as he tries to push it back again
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Rayudu, FOUR runs

items.text: blocked in front of off
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Rayudu, no run

items.text: hangs back to a length ball and knocks it to mid-on
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Sharma, no run

items.text: short, that's a gift for Rohit who picks lengths so early, smokes it over cow corner with a brilliant pull
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Sharma, SIX runs

items.text: full on off, pushed into the off side
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Sharma, no run

items.text: punches a back of a length ball crisply to cover
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Sharma, no run
